contentfragment.text: About Stanley Heading About Stanley! Copy Hello everybody. I’m Stanley, a handsome Vue application created by Shannon Sumner. Stanley is a really simple application to showcase my skills in a cute & clean way. Quote "No one is perfect - that’s why pencils have erasers." Wolfgang Riebe Keynote Speaker/Magician

text_1013760614.text:
Bold can be used to emphasize a word or phrase, as can underline and italics. Superscript and subscript are useful for mathematical (E = mc2) or scientific (h2O) expressions. Paragraph styles can provide alternative renderings, such as quote sections:

"Be yourself; everyone else is already taken"
- Oscar Wilde
